html:
11.23.24  1:41 am   What is your favorite song that you have made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.23.24  1:40 am   ...thank you. I don't know how many messages you get like this or how often you respond to them (if at all), but I just hope you see it. Your work makes me feel like things will be okay. I think it's because it's really about the good things, but what holds it up is the acknowledgment and engagement with the bad things. I was going to ask you to please never stop making art, but now that I think about it, that would be an unfair thing to ask an artist, so I guess this is not a question.

      sometimes artists refuse to stop, even when asked to

11.22.24  11:31 pm   when's the last time you thought about the roman empire?

      i think 2 days ago when someone mentioned it here in a question

11.22.24  11:25 pm   is it always raining somewhere?  

     from what i understand, it doesn't have to be, but it probably is

     when was the last time it wasn't raining anywhere?

     i have no idea

11.22.24  10:32 pm   any general holiday season advice? no need for anything crazy i'd just like to know what you'd recommend really 

      this is more of a cool memory trick, this works better the further away from the equator you get: sometime in June, think back to your memories of the previous december holiday season. you will notice, if you live in the northern hemisphere, that there seems to be a lot of nighttime in those memories. or if you live in the southern hemisphere, you will notice a lot of bright daytime memories from that time

11.22.24  10:24 pm   i'm thirsty for knowledge

      that's normal

11.22.24  9:32 pm   if you think about nothing are you thinking about thinking of nothing or visualizing nothing as something, or perhaps you think about thinking of visualizing nothing as an empty void which would counteract it because a void must be encased in something like gravity or a discernable barrier because if not how would you know its empty of anything.... or maybe you should pretend its empty because most of the time nothing happens if your wrong

      i think the point here is, to think about nothing you probably wouldn't be aware of it

11.22.24  6:56 pm   How do I get involved in politics?

      hmm, there's a lot of signs in people's yards, maybe you could make the wooden sticks for the sign to go on

11.22.24  3:24 pm   does train have the ch sound because ive always pronounced it like chrain 

      in that case, it does

11.22.24  3:22 pm   what you think of the letters b, d, p, and q being effectively the same letter but reflected along an axis

      you're only talking about how they are written (not the sound) and also this only works in some fonts

11.22.24  2:57 pm   should we make the sun blue so it matches the sky

      i don't know

11.22.24  1:37 pm   Do you view yourself as a part of any specific artistic tradition, or are you more of an ungrounded eclectic?

      believe it or not, one way or another there is a tradition in being groundedly eclectic

11.22.24  1:11 pm   Whenever I make a song, I always try to look at it through the lens of 'how would I feel about this song if I was hearing it on the radio for the first time'... but, obviously, my ears are biased because I'm the one making the thing. Its not just the recording process when I do a bunch of takes of everything, but in the writing process too. I want to be able to think about what I'm writing as if I'm just listening to a song (not the one who is writing the song)... but I feel like this is maybe impossible? Do you have any tricks that might be helpful with this? 

      you might have to actually have fun

11.22.24  12:52 pm   whats the trick to asking why someone did something (out of curiosity) and not seeming like you are judging or accusing them of doing something wrong

      how about "that's interesting how you did that. tell me about that". what i find is, to the extent that that sounds judgemental, the judgemental aspect seems humorous. but i find the sweet spot plays it 50% of the way between you agree or don't agree. you're exactly 50% sure of whether or not you would agree with their decision, and you certainly need further explanation before deciding

11.22.24  11:39 am   Do you ever get annoyed when, in a piece of time travel media, there's a paradox of some kind. Usually the bootstrap paradox. Or does it never really bother you

      that can be a problem

11.22.24  11:19 am   what is possible

      we'll think of something

11.22.24  10:32 am   What's the best antidote for becoming cynical as we get older?

      i was gonna say you could be cynical about how so many other people get cynical while you don't, but on second thought i don't think that's gonna work

11.22.24  9:49 am   can you tell me why my friend likes tomatoes

      no, and i also can't explain why someone who doesn't doesn't

11.22.24  9:44 am   What's your favorite song that you created? How long did it take to create it?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.22.24  9:29 am   is a taco a hotdog

      no

11.22.24  9:11 am   favorite greek letter?

      θ

11.22.24  9:09 am   any tips for language learning?

      it's easier than most people think, and it takes longer than most people think. let me say that again, just in case the combination of bad + good news caused anyone to mis-read it: it takes longer than most people think, and it is easier than most people think

11.22.24  8:39 am   do u Have a favorite phrase

      no

11.22.24  7:17 am   why can i only make good music 10% of the time, what is stopping me from making good music 100% of the time is there perhaps something wrong with me

      there's no such thing as good music 100% of the time

11.22.24  6:42 am   most engaging sound that can be created with 2 letters?

      oy

11.22.24  5:11 am   what is the meaning of life

      so many different things. there's always new meanings also

11.22.24  3:02 am   should video game have main menu

      not always

11.22.24  2:04 am   Do you think philosophy could be solved and what would that mean for art

      if philosophy could be solved then art would end

11.22.24  1:52 am   are your songs and videos works of fiction, nonfiction, or something in between?

      a mix of all 3

11.22.24  1:16 am   Why do animals sleep but plants stay awake?

      i thought plants were always asleep

11.22.24  12:53 am   I'm incredibly stressed out by my job. Even
though what my company does is objectively stupid, I care about it and want to do a good job. But the stress is destroying my enjoyment of my life. What do I do?

      what an incredible slogan for that company, if they are not already using it

11.22.24  12:09 am   What's the funniest answer you can come up with for this question

      nothing is funny if you say it's gonna be. when asked to be funny, the most valuable response would probably be to tell the truth

11.22.24  12:01 am   do you like showing people what you create?

      one way or another, it's probably what i should do

11.21.24  11:17 pm   What do you do to find inspiration/motivation?

      anything

11.21.24  11:16 pm   What do you think of solipsism?

      useless

11.21.24  10:57 pm   temperature-wise, how cucumber are you?

      not at all

11.21.24  10:45 pm   What is your favorite pony

      only the best one

11.21.24  9:36 pm   would you rather learn yoruba, igbo or hausa

      i really can't decide

11.21.24  8:28 pm   Do you have a favorite font?

      no

11.21.24  8:17 pm   Is bread just hard gluten?

      i'm honestly not sure

11.21.24  5:34 pm   if you are wearing your shirt, is your shirt wearing the world around it

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.21.24  4:41 pm   what does not existing feel like?

      i was gonna say nothing, but it's probably more like everything

11.21.24  1:34 pm   Any tips for college?

      i'm not an expert here, but i surmise you'd first want to find the location of the college in which you are enrolled

11.21.24  1:33 pm   One time I told myself I would do something and then I didn't. What do I tell myself now?

      how about asking some questions instead

11.21.24  12:53 pm   Say the most random thing possible. I'm curious

      j9jbtq7hnyq9gz9fj0zgmkp7q5q3303taeefrbxh0

11.21.24  12:50 pm   Do you think your post-2020 works would be different had the COVID pandemic not occurred? 

      no

11.21.24  12:50 pm   Are you a W sigma rizzler average mango enjoyer gigachad nonadrenaline alpha still water phonk evil troll face hardcore gamer?

      not exactly

11.21.24  12:42 pm   Are the thought and feelings in the song "At The Corner store" genuine , i.e. shaped by real experiences in a corner store or are they made up for plot purposes ? 

      one way or another, i'm actually singing about the entire universe. very little to do with an actual retail store, just using that as a familiar friendly place on which to focus our dreams

11.21.24  12:17 pm   should i speak my ideas even if they're wrong 

      sure. the paradox here is, if they are your ideas then you probably believe they are right

11.21.24  12:06 pm   why do I have this clear feeling that there is an overwhelming all-knowing darkness watching over us and judging our every move for purposes beyond human comprehension.

      have you ever tried to judge yourself?
